smapsActiveEntity.msgText: 242007Z NOV 25 NAVAREA IV 1303/25(GEN). 1. NORTH AMERICAN ICE SERVICE (NAIS) ICEBERG BULLETIN 250001Z NOV. 2. ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING 49-30N 054-30W, 50-00N 049-00W, 50-45N 048-30W, 55-00N 049-45W, 59-45N 057-30W. 3. ESTIMATED ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING 59-45N 057-30W, 61-10N 052-25W, 60-00N 049-40W, 59-05N 043-55W, 59-45N 041-45W, 64-00N 037-50W, 65-00N 028-20W. 4. WESTERN ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING 51-17N 058-18W, 50-20N 057-30W. 5. SEA ICE LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINES JOINING: A. 60-15N 064-58W, 58-47N 066-52W, 59-10N 068-58W, 60-47N 069-26W. B. 63-47N 080-08W, 65-34N 082-51W, 66-45N 080-53W, 66-41N 076-17W, 65-00N 078-58W, 64-22N 079-00W, 62-27N 070-32W, 62-27N 069-14W. C. 62-01N 066-03W, 62-15N 064-00W, 66-45N 060-45W, 70-21N 061-12W. 6. MOST RECENT RECONNAISSANCE: INTERIOR SATELLITE PASS 24 NOV 25. 7. REPORT POSITION AND TIME OF ANY ICEBERGS SEA ICE OR STATIONARY RADAR TARGETS THAT MAY LIKELY BE ICE TO THE NEAREST CANADIAN COAST GUARD MARINE COMMUNICATIONS AND TRAFFIC SERVICE STATION OR USING INMARSAT CODE 42. 8. FOR MORE REPORTING INFORMATION OR TO DOWNLOAD SHAPEFILES AND WEEKLY PREDICTIONS, GO TO WWW.NAVCEN.USCG.GOV/IIP. 9. CANCEL THIS MSG 260001Z NOV 25.

041331Z DEC 24 NAVAREA IV 1524/24(25). EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA. ST. KITTS AND NEVIS. 1. SABA BANK HAS BEEN DESIGNATED AS AN IMO ADOPTED AREA TO BE AVOIDED (ATBA) AND PARTICULARLY SENSITIVE SEA AREA (PSSA). 2. TO AVOID THE RISK OF POLLUTION AND DAMAGE TO THE ENVIRONMENT, ENTRY IS PROHIBITED FOR VESSELS OF 300 GROSS TONS AND GREATER, AND ANCHORING IS PROHIBITED FOR ALL VESSELS, IN AREA BOUND BY 17-27.06N 063-56.14W, 17-29.00N 063-55.09W, 17-27.94N 063-43.32W, 17-38.03N 063-27.41W, 17-43.35N 063-32.74W, 17-45.98N 063-29.98W, 17-40.34N 063-21.10W, 17-30.88N 063-10.92W, 17-23.80N 063-11.25W, 17-16.27N 063-15.85W, 17-13.44N 063-26.89W, 17-10.55N 063-41.81W, 17-20.85N 063-49.89W. VESSELS VIOLATING THESE REGULATIONS WILL RECEIVE A FINE. 3. FOR FURTHER INFORMATION, CONTACT DUTCH CARRIBEAN COAST GUARD, PHONE: 599 9463 7620, 599 9510 0913, EMAIL: RCC.CURACAO@MINDEF.NL. 4.
